Your donations fund development of the distribution and renewal of its domain
name and others. The amount of time I (pwnwriter) can dedicate to the
project is dependent on your support.

If you're from Nepal, you can donate to us on eSewa from the following QR Code. And for international payment, there's my [Kofi](https://ko-fi.com/pwnwriter).
